name: Juicy Fruit Crush
description:
Juicy Fruit Crush is a free match 3 game that is easy and fun to learn but difficult to master! It is a nonstop supply of juicy fruits and the farmer has to make sure that there are no rotten apples that will destroy the whole batch of juicy fruits and leave him with nothing to take to market!

In this simple but juicy game help the farmer line up 3 or more identical fruits, vertically or horizontally. Swipe, dash and crush to win earn loads of tokens along the way and use them to buy cool Powerups.

Game Features:
“DIG THE ULTRA COOL DESIGN”
Check out the juicy, super cool graphics and move to the songs and sound effects as you blast out a move.

“TRY 3 MODES OF GAME PLAY”
Levels –Test your skills and come out on top.
Timed – Match as many juicy fruits as you can as the seconds slip away.
Endless – Crush, swipe and dash to earn tons of tokens.

“EARN COOL POWERUPS”
Juicer – Create any fruit to help with your matching madness.
Magic Net – Destroy all of one type of juicy fruit in one munch!
Rotten Apple Trap – Catch the Rotten Apple and get rid of him before he rots the whole box of fruit!
Hints - Find mysterious matches and solve the puzzle.

“CHOOSE A BACKGROUND”
Choose from Bright Lights Big City, Arabian Nights, Desert Sky and more.

“WHAT KIND OF A CHEF ARE YOU?!”
Play to beat your high score, earn tokens and redeem them for helpful Powerups.
